title: Vanamaali Emerald & Diamond Pendant - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Premium Quality Zambian Emeralds (Oval and Pear Cut)
Uncut Diamonds (Polki/Vennupotu Diamonds) with GH Color and VS Clarity. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Inspired by the Vanamaali (forest garland) motif, this pendant showcases a stunning arrangement of Zambian Emeralds and Polki Diamonds. The design incorporates a central floral element adorned with diamonds, cascading down to a fringe of teardrop-shaped diamonds. The setting uses a Kundan-style encasing for the Polki Diamonds. Back side is detailed with intricate goldwork that is symbolic to temple jewelry.
colors: with slight tints of natural hues in Polki.
occasions: or as a statement piece for upscale parties. Also can be styled to match with office wears.
description: This pendant combines the elegance of traditional South Indian jewelry with a contemporary design sensibility. The use of high-quality Zambian Emeralds and Polki Diamonds, coupled with expert craftsmanship, ensures a timeless heirloom. Represents wealth, prosperity, and good luck - a perfect gift for any special occasion.
